name: Mautic Community 4.0.2
body:
## Bugs üêû 

- Fixed mautic:unusedip:delete [#10589](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10589) [#10536](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10536)
- Fix Amazon SES API transport multiple unsubscribe header using send immediately [#10557](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10557)
- Fix sync salesforce if company has name with html entity code of singlequote [#10535](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10535)
- Do not write to console when updating segments if quiet flag is specified [#10533](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10533) [#10531](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/issues/10531)
- Focus: hide form If we use notice type of popups  [#10527](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10527)
- Fix email translations lost and overwritten by parent [#10525](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10525)
- Fix salesforce sync companies even are disabled [#10497](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10497)
- Fix Preference Center Javascript issue [#10495](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10495)
- Fix set values from properties for state field [#10486](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10486)
- Fix form field campaign condition with special character in value [#10470](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10470)
- Fix Invalid clickthrough value exception [#10444](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10444)
- Fix date range  in segments and reports does not trigger ajax request [#10421](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10421)
- Fix Illegal Address - Enclosing sender name with double quotes [#10326](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10326)
- Guzzle Http refactor [#10308](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10308)
- Fix API creating tag duplicates [#10270](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10270)
- Fix form submit messages length [#10266](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10266)
- Fix dashboard report line graphs [#10209](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10209)
- Fix display zero values in reports [#10167](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10167)
- Unable to perform "Change campaign" Action for removing a contact from one and adding to another campaign [#10151](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10151)
- Fix process string in contact's audit log [#10061](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/10061)
- Salesforce: Check DNC status [#9956](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/9956)
- Some winner criteria not working properly in A/B Tests [#9936](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/9936)
- Add select/multiselect to NormalizedValueDAO from internal object [#9919](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/9919)
- Fix duplicate entry for key campaign_rotation [#9639](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/9639)
- Fix campaign trigger inactive schedule decision after scheduled event [#9486](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/9486)
- Fix A new entity was found through the relationship 'Mautic\LeadBundle\Entity\Company#owner [#9328](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/9328)
- Fix campaign membership syncing when an issue such as api limits occur [#7514](https://github.com/mautic/mautic/pull/7514)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@alanhartless](https://github.com/alanhartless)
- [@alfredoct96](https://github.com/alfredoct96)
- [@mabumusa1](https://github.com/mabumusa1)
- [@kuzmany](https://github.com/kuzmany)
- [@dadarya0](https://github.com/dadarya0)
- [@giomasce](https://github.com/giomasce)
- [@pedroegg](https://github.com/pedroegg)
- [@patrykgruszka](https://github.com/patrykgruszka)
- [@dennisameling](https://github.com/dennisameling)
- [@julienWebmecanik](https://github.com/julienWebmecanik)
- [@luguenth](https://github.com/luguenth)
- [@ts-navghane](https://github.com/ts-navghane)
- [@fedys](https://github.com/fedys)
